chronoMod:AncientClock.NAME: Ancient Clock
chronoMod:AncientClock.FLAVOR: It does not show the actual time?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first #b3 turns, #yRecall: Gain [E] and draw #b1 card.

chronoMod:BrokenClock.NAME: Broken Clock
chronoMod:BrokenClock.FLAVOR: You cannot tell the time with this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yRecall: Gain [E] and draw #b1 card.

chronoMod:Broom.NAME: Broom
chronoMod:Broom.FLAVOR: The most dangerous weather to ride a broom in is light rain.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b4 cards that cost #b0, draw #b1 card.

chronoMod:CatsTail.NAME: Cat's Tail
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you receive unblocked #yAttack damage each combat, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to damage received.

chronoMod:FeatherQuill.NAME: Feather Quill
chronoMod:FeatherQuill.FLAVOR: The standard writing instrument in the magic world.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger a #yRecall effect, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy.

chronoMod:Goggles.NAME: Goggles
chronoMod:Goggles.FLAVOR: You can see further with this.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat costs #b0.

chronoMod:Grimoire.NAME: Grimoire
chronoMod:Grimoire.FLAVOR: This handbook only contains useless spells like summoning a flower bed.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you spend [E] on a cost X card, a random card in your hand costs #b0 this turn.

chronoMod:MagicalHerb.NAME: Magical Herb
chronoMod:MagicalHerb.FLAVOR: It is said to be able to bring protection, love, health, and wealth into your life.
DESCRIPTIONS: Consume a #yJade at the end of your turn.

chronoMod:MagnifyingGlass.NAME: MagnifyingGlass
chronoMod:MagnifyingGlass.FLAVOR: This glass seems to minimize things instead of magnifying them. Weird...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, you can choose to place up to #b5 cards from draw pile into your discard pile.

chronoMod:OldWine.NAME: Old Wine
chronoMod:OldWine.FLAVOR: It smells funny. You feel funny after smelling it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b2 #yStrength and #b1 #yJade.

chronoMod:Refresher.NAME: Refresher
chronoMod:Refresher.FLAVOR: Across an epoch of endless battle, the Immortal's will to triumph never faltered.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw an #yUnplayable card, draw #b1 card.

chronoMod:RubyAmulet.NAME: Ruby Amulet
chronoMod:RubyAmulet.FLAVOR: "Ruby is the best out of all gem." - Kublai the Great

chronoMod:Scroll.NAME: Scroll
chronoMod:Scroll.FLAVOR: You cannot understand the ancient language written on this. Let's hope you can find someone who does.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first cost X card you play each combat has its effect increased by #b3.

chronoMod:Winder.NAME: Winder
chronoMod:Winder.FLAVOR: The key does not fit in the clock that you have.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, trigger the first Recall effect twice.
